source.sqlReaderQuery: select * from information_Schema.tables where table_type='BASE TABLE'

sqlReaderQuery.value: select data_source_table.PersonID,data_source_table.Name,data_source_table.Age, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from data_source_table RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES data_source_table, @{activity('lkp1').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on data_source_table.PersonID = CT.PersonID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('lkp2').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}
